channel.title: Shop making problem
channel.description:
I used a 634 source from marcbob.. When i tried to add a shop it really went easy but i just had 1 error from cmd that's true this symbol , if somewane maybe now how to solve pleas reply..
here is some more information. But i just have one question if i add a shop.. this happens idk what cmd means whit this problem?
This is the shop i try to create.. [code] /* * Owner Shop */ shop.put(13, new Shop(13, false, new int[] {19784,18349,18351,18353,18355,18357, 18359,13531,13532,13533,13534,13535,13536,13537,13538,13539,13540}, new int[] {1000,1000,1000,1000,1000,1000,1000,1000,1000,1000,1000,1000, 1000,1000,1000,1000}));[/code]
This is what cmd tells me [code]src\org\dementhium\model\player\ShopManager.java:85: error: cannot find symbol shop.put(13, new Shop(13, false, new int[] {19784,18349,18351,18 353,18355,18357, ^ symbol: variable shop location: class ShopManager 1 error[/code]
Pls helps :( i know i'm not the master in code so don't flame at me.

item.title: Shop making problem
item.dc:creator: @ebert ebert
item.description:
@ebert wrote:

I used a 634 source from marcbob…
When i tried to add a shop it really went easy but i just had 1 error from cmd that’s true this symbol , if somewane maybe now how to solve pleas reply…

here is some more information.
But i just have one question if i add a shop… this happens idk what cmd means whit this problem?

This is the shop i try to create…

/* * Owner Shop */ shop.put(13, new Shop(13, false, new int[] {19784,18349,18351,18353,18355,18357, 18359,13531,13532,13533,13534,13535,13536,13537,13538,13539,13540}, new int[] {1000,1000,1000,1000,1000,1000,1000,1000,1000,1000,1000,1000, 1000,1000,1000,1000}));

This is what cmd tells me

src\org\dementhium\model\player\ShopManager.java:85: error: cannot find symbol shop.put(13, new Shop(13, false, new int[] {19784,18349,18351,18 353,18355,18357, ^ symbol: variable shop location: class ShopManager 1 error

Pls helps
i know i’m not the master in code so don’t flame at me.

Read full topic
